data.title: Great bar
data.text: This is my second visit to Shiner's. I really live the atmosphere and local beer selection on tap. They have a life size version of operation on the rooftop deck with pieces coming soon. Great place, check it out.

data.title: Great Rooftop Patio.
data.text: Fun atmosphere. Great views. Lots of TVs. They have a giant connect four game and corn hole. We loved their potato skins. Very unique way to serve them. The cheese is queso instead of melted shredded cheese. They were delicious. Drinks were great too. We would definitely go back.

data.title: Great veggie tacos!
data.text:
Visited here to satisfy my midnight munchies. One of the only places (maybe the only
Place?) downtown where late night food is available. Fantastic veggie tacos to take away for only €9. Job done!

data.title: Fun day Sunday !!
data.text: Had a great time Jolee is a great bartender!!spent the afternoon with great music and then watched the woman's World Cup!!!

data.title: Enjoyed our evening there!!
data.text: Three very talented young musicians performed there. Music was great. A mix of country & old rock & Texas red dirt music. The saloon was unique (upstairs), drinks were good & the best chicken quesadillas I ever ate. Friendly bartender & musicians. I appreciated that there was no smoking allowed upstairs since I have a lung disease. It wasn't overly crowded either. Two of the musicians were Chad Hammock & Colby Keeling. So talented!  Can't wait to go back here on our next trip to Austin!
